Hack and Help

A local tech response to the european refugee crisis


19th November 2015

Save your seat!

About Hack and Help

A local tech response

A local tech response to the european refugee crisis. Get an overview of the crisis from helpers at the frontline. Connect with motivated hackers and helpers. Solve local problems with global impact.

HACK. CONNECT. SOLVE.

Our government expect about 1 Mio refugees arriving in Germany (especially Munich) this year. Hack and Help wants to start a regular 'techfugee' meetup in Munich, trying to connect all the motivated (but distributed) organisers and helpers from the city with our local tech community. The meetup includes regular hackathons, project meetings and speakers

20+
attendees

from rockstar organisations

5+
tables

of snacks, pizza and beer

1
goal

solving a big problem
